name: Routing Done Right
description:
• What we'll do
There are many ways to manage your routes in an Angular application. In this talk, we will discuss the basics, modularization, and lazy-loading.

In addition to our main talk, we will also have a lightning talk on 'Effective Code Reviews'.

Come join us! Eat, drink, network, and begin your journey to becoming a routing guru.

• What to bring
Yourself and your colleagues.

• Important to know
Here are some resources to get your feet wet:
~ Angular Routing - Victor Savkin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QLns6s02O48
~ Wildcard and Redirects: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QC6wRxXT26I
~ Routing Params: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qh5nHv-4aw0
~ Optional Params: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gnTFkl2AF-w
~ Router Auth: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yjxOYsRkozQ
~ Lazy Loading: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-1Fq_mAl20

name: Build a form in minutes using Angular Reactive Forms
description:
• What we'll do
We’ll build a standard-but-tricky Reactive form from scratch in less than 10 minutes!

---
We have a special speaker tonight:
Lyndsey Padget- founder of Longplay Software in Kansas City.
